Name: Pear Shaped
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with pear wedge on rim.
Review: Scotch, pear and apple combine wonderfully in this fruity and balanced cocktail. Pear juice in place of apple juice produces a richer and arguably tastier cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2003 by Jamie Terrell at the iconic Dick's Bar at the Atlantic Bar & Grill in London, England. The Atlantic Bar & Grill opened in 1994, and it, particularly Dick's Bar, is considered the birthplace of the cocktail renaissance. Jamie's original recipe was shaken and strained into an ice-filled Collins glass and comprised: 60ml (2oz) Scotch whisky 30ml (1oz) Pear & Cognac liqueur 90ml (3oz) Apple juice 15ml (½oz) Lime juice 7.5ml (¼oz) Vanilla syrup A "Deluxe Version" was shaken and strained into a chilled Martini glass: Pulp of 1 fresh Passion fruit 45ml (1½oz)  Scotch whisky 30ml (1oz) Pear & cognac liqueur 30ml (1oz) Apple juice 30ml (1oz) Pear juice 7.5ml (¼oz) Lime juice
Nutrition: One serving of Pear Shaped contains 186 calories
